item.title: Soulslinger: Envoy of Death coming to PS5, Xbox Series on February 19
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Currently available for PC.

Publisher Headup Games and developer Elder Games will release Wild West-themed roguelite first-person shooter Soulslinger: Envoy of Death for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on February 19, the companies announced.

Soulslinger: Envoy of Death first launched in Early Access for PC via Steam on December 14, 2023, followed by a full release on April 17, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

You are a gunslinger in limbo, involved in a gritty war against “The Cartel,” a ruthless organization harvesting souls to break free of the shackles of the afterlife. Grow stronger with each new run, gather the essence of lost souls to take on the biggest threats in this roguelite first-person shooter!

Death is Calling: Will You Answer?

Become an Envoy of Death, able to unleash the incredible powers that will make you the most dangerous soul in Limbo. Upgrade your character’s abilities to become the ultimate Soulslinger and take on thrilling challenges in a bloody war against the criminal cartel of the afterlife!

Meet Stray Souls and Make Allies or Enemies

Step into the rich and immersive world of Haven, filled with mysterious NPCs who hold the secrets to its dark history. Be wary of the allies and enemies you make as every encounter might shape your journey ahead. In this mesmerizing western-fantasy world, you will experience a tale of grief, loss, and one man’s obsession with cheating death itself.

Craft Your Weapons and Rise to Victory

Forge your own destiny with every run by crafting powerful weapons and unlocking permanent upgrades in Haven. Grow stronger with every new challenge and become an incredibly deadly gunslinger. Get ready for a fast-paced roguelite first-person shooter experience you won’t ever forget!

Key Features

  • Fast-paced, story-driven roguelike first-person shooter set in random sequences of rooms built in a unique western-fantasy world.
  • Customize Soulslinger through a deep upgrade system.
  • Experience a tightly written story filled with loyal allies and charismatic villains. The story adapts to what you do in the roguelike gameplay.
  • Tons of gun fodder creeps that attack in waves, spiced up by challenging elite mobs.

item.title: Freestyle Football 2 PS5 and Xbox Series closed beta test set for January 30 to February 2
item.content:encoded:
• PS5
  • Xbox Series

Sign-ups now available.

Publisher JOYCITY and developer WOORE will host a closed beta test for premium football game Freestyle Football 2 from January 30 to February 2, the companies announced. Sign-ups are available via the official website.

The goals for the closed beta test are to “fine-tune cross-platform play, ensure server stability, and gather critical player feedback” ahead of the game’s launch.

“Players will join fast paced five-versus-five online matches featuring a ‘one player, one character’ control system with seven unique playable characters, each bringing their own flair to the field!” reads the announcement. “All players who take part will receive Closed Beta Test Participant rewards for exclusive in-game items such as ‘Kickoff Cleats’ and a profile icon, ‘Secret Kickoff.'”

The closed beta test will be available from January 30 to February 2 during the following regional windows:

  • North America – 8:00 p.m. to 12:00 a.m. ET
  • Europe – 20:00 to 24:00 CET
  • Asia – 20:00 to 24:00 KST

Freestyle Football 2 is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC in Q2 2026.

Watch a new trailer below.

Closed Beta Test Trailer
